user.title: Bithumb/KIS Trading Bot setup
user.description:
Fill in the required credentials and strategy parameters before starting the add-on.
* **Exchange** controls whether the bot connects to Bithumb (crypto) or Korea Investment & Securities (stocks).
* Fields marked as "Required" must contain real values before you disable dry-run mode.

repository_url.title: Repository URL (Required)
repository_url.description: Git repository that will be cloned inside the add-on container.

repository_ref.title: Repository branch or tag (Required)
repository_ref.description: Branch, tag, or commit to checkout after cloning.

exchange.title: Target exchange (Required)
exchange.description: Choose Bithumb for crypto trading or KIS for overseas stock trading via OpenAPI.

bot_symbol_ticker.title: Market symbol (Required)
bot_symbol_ticker.description: Default market pair or ticker (e.g. USDT_KRW for Bithumb, TQQQ for KIS).

bot_order_currency.title: Order currency (Required)
bot_order_currency.description: Asset to place orders with (crypto symbol or stock ticker).

bot_payment_currency.title: Settlement currency (Required)
bot_payment_currency.description: Quote currency used when calculating price levels (e.g. KRW or USD).

bot_dry_run.title: Dry-run mode (Required)
bot_dry_run.description: Keep this enabled while testing. Disable only after entering valid API keys.

bot_hf_mode.title: High-frequency mode (Optional)
bot_hf_mode.description: Use the HF parameter set tuned for tighter grids and more frequent fills.

default_base_order_value.title: Default base order size (KRW/USD, Required)
default_base_order_value.description: Starting order value for the standard grid set, expressed in the settlement currency.

default_buy_step.title: Default grid gap (Required)
default_buy_step.description: Price gap between grid levels for the standard set (decimal form, 0.008 = 0.8%).

default_martingale_mul.title: Default martingale multiplier (Required)
default_martingale_mul.description: Scaling factor applied to each additional buy in the standard grid.

default_max_steps.title: Default maximum steps (Required)
default_max_steps.description: How many ladder entries are allowed for the standard grid.

hf_base_order_value.title: HF base order size (KRW/USD, Optional)
hf_base_order_value.description: Starting order value for the high-frequency grid set.

hf_buy_step.title: HF grid gap (Optional)
hf_buy_step.description: Price gap between grid levels for the HF set (decimal form, 0.005 = 0.5%).

hf_martingale_mul.title: HF martingale multiplier (Optional)
hf_martingale_mul.description: Scaling factor applied to each additional buy in the HF grid.

hf_max_steps.title: HF maximum steps (Optional)
hf_max_steps.description: How many ladder entries are allowed for the HF grid.

bithumb_api_key.title: Bithumb API key (Required for Bithumb)
bithumb_api_key.description: Enter the personal API key generated in your Bithumb account.

bithumb_api_secret.title: Bithumb API secret (Required for Bithumb)
bithumb_api_secret.description: Enter the matching API secret. Store it securely.

kis_app_key.title: KIS AppKey (Required for KIS)
kis_app_key.description: OpenAPI AppKey issued by Korea Investment & Securities.

kis_app_secret.title: KIS AppSecret (Required for KIS)
kis_app_secret.description: OpenAPI AppSecret paired with the AppKey.

kis_account_no.title: KIS account number (Required for KIS)
kis_account_no.description: Full account number without dashes (required for live or paper trading).

kis_account_password.title: KIS account password (Required for KIS)
kis_account_password.description: Account password for order placement. Required by the OpenAPI.

kis_mode.title: KIS trading mode (Required for KIS)
kis_mode.description: Select `paper` for the virtual server or `live` for the production endpoint.

kis_exchange_code.title: KIS exchange code (Optional)
kis_exchange_code.description: Market code used by KIS (e.g. NASD for NASDAQ).

kis_symbol.title: KIS target symbol (Optional)
kis_symbol.description: Stock or ETF symbol to trade on the selected exchange.

kis_currency.title: KIS settlement currency (Optional)
kis_currency.description: Currency for quotes and settlement, typically USD for US markets.

kis_order_lot_size.title: KIS order lot size (Optional)
kis_order_lot_size.description: Quantity per order in shares. Fractional values are allowed if permitted.

enable_gateway.title: Enable Home Assistant gateway (Optional)
enable_gateway.description: Expose the optional FastAPI gateway. Default port: 6443.

gateway_port.title: Gateway port (Optional)
gateway_port.description: TCP port used by the optional FastAPI gateway. Change this only if 6443 conflicts with another service.
